meta.name: Meeting Notes to Actions
meta.description: Condenses messy meeting notes into decisions, risks, and next actions.

data.label: Parse Notes
data.prompt: Extract attendees (if present), topics, and key arguments from the notes. Output concise bullets.

data.label: Decisions & Actions
data.prompt: Output three sections: Decisions (with owners if implied), Open Risks, Next Actions (each with owner TBD and due hint). Keep it under 180 words.
